data.title: New Holland Brewing in Grand Rapids
data.meta_description: We find that the best moments in life — the most memorable — are when we spend time in the company of those who are most important to us. Our beer and spirits are made for these moments.
data.meta_site_name: New Holland Brewing - Brewery and Distillery in Holland, MI
data.text:
Hours & Location

417 Bridge St. NW,

Grand Rapids, MI 49504

(616) 345-5642

Located on a bustling stretch of Bridge Street in downtown Grand Rapids, our second brewpub is affectionately known as “The Knickerbocker.” The expansive brewpub features an indoor and outdoor beer garden, three separate bars, a wood-fired oven, and many dining spaces suited for private events. The menu includes artisanal and locally-sourced food, our full line of craft beer and spirits, small-batch pub brews, handcrafted cocktails, and more!

NEW! We are ready to welcome guests to our all-season beer garden with the addition of a new retractable roof. Guests can dine outdoors year-round, regardless of rain or snow. The addition of the retractable roof takes away the guesswork from the unpredictable Michigan weather and hard winters. The radiant overheard heating system will provide a for a comfortable outdoor space.

Daily Specials

INTERSTELLAR TUESDAYS – $2 off Tangerine & Peach Space Machine in pints, steins, crowlers, and growlers / $15 Sangria Carafes / BOGO 50% off specialty pizzas / Double Points Tuesday for our Loyalty Members

EVERYTHING IS BIG ON WEDNESDAYS – Steins deals / Adult juice pouches / $5 Taller cans / Twisted Taller cocktails / $3 Mystery shots

THIRSY THURSDAYS – Pints starting at $5 / Featured steins for $5 / $5 shooters and shot & pops / $3 mystery shots / 10% off full cases of beer, seltzer, and canned cocktails to go / $2 off select appetizers from 4-6pm
